title: Windows Black Screen Issues
description: Fix black screen on login, after GPU tasks, or during display initialization.

steps.title: Wake Up Display
steps.instruction: Press 'Win+Ctrl+Shift+B'. This resets the graphics driver and can often clear a black screen instantly.

steps.title: Check Video Cables
steps.instruction: Unplug and firmly replug your HDMI/DisplayPort cable. Try a different port on the GPU if available.

steps.title: Restart Windows Explorer
steps.instruction: If you can see the mouse, press Ctrl+Shift+Esc → File → Run new task → type 'explorer.exe' → Enter.

steps.title: Boot in Low Resolution
steps.instruction: Restart → F8 (Advanced Boot) → Enable Low-Resolution Video. This bypasses high-refresh rate errors.

steps.title: Disable Fast Startup
steps.instruction: Control Panel → Power Options → Choose what power buttons do → Uncheck 'Turn on fast startup'. This fixes many black screen login issues.
